original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: US Charges Europe 10% Extra for Weapons to Ukraine, Funding Potential Air Support: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced that the US is charging European nations an additional 10% for weapons they purchase for Ukraine, with the increased price intended to offset costs for any direct support Washington provides for Kiev. The extra funds could potentially cover the cost of air support for Ukraine.</s>
